name: hubble-thing
description: Our entry for NASA Space Apps Challenge 2018
author: Andrew McDonnell & Zachary McDonnell

scripts.bundle: mkdir -p dist && browserify --standalone hubble --debug src/index.js -g uglifyify -t [ babelify --global --presets [ babel-preset-es2015-script ] ] -t uglifyify | exorcist src/index.js.map > dist/bundle.js
scripts.bundle0: mkdir -p dist && browserify --standalone hubble --debug src/index.js > dist/bundle.js

//: babel-preset-es2015-script to avoid undefined (this) error in mapshaper (https://stackoverflow.com/a/34983495)
